      • createReservation

        public void createReservation(int tableNumber,
                              int numberOfPeople,
                              java.lang.String hpNumber,
                              java.lang.String customerName,
                              java.lang.String dateReserved,
                              java.lang.String timeOfArrival,
                              java.lang.String slot)
        createReservation allows a reservation to be made
        Parameters:
        tableNumber - The tables number assigned to the reservation
        numberOfPeople - The number of people attached to the reservation
        hpNumber - The handphone number of the customer
        customerName - The name of the customer
        dateReserved - The date reserved
        timeOfArrival - The time of the reservation
        slot - The AM/PM slot
